ChangeList.Description: Added the **isHotpatchUpdate** property to the [productRevision](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsUpdates-productRevision?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **isHotpatchEnabled** property to the [userExperienceSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-userexperiencesettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the **applicableContent** property from the [windowsupdates-deploymentAudience](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsUpdates-deploymentAudience?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **applicableContent** relationship to the [windowsupdates-deploymentAudience](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsUpdates-deploymentAudience?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the **matchedDevices** property from the [windowsupdates-applicableContent](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsUpdates-applicableContent?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **matchedDevices** relationship to the [windowsupdates-applicableContent](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsUpdates-applicableContent?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **catalogEntryId** property to the [windowsupdates-applicableContent](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsUpdates-applicableContent?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **deviceId** navigation property from the [windowsupdates-applicablecontentdevicematch](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsUpdates-applicablecontentdevicematch?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Deleted the **device** property to the [windowsupdates-applicablecontentdevicematch](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsUpdates-applicablecontentdevicematch?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **offerAsOptional** property to the [userExperienceSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-userexperiencesettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **isReadinessTest** property to the [expediteSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-expeditesettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the `ineligible` member to the **monitoringSignal** enumeration.
Added the `offerFallback` member to the **monitoringAction** enumeration.
Added the **buildNumber** property to the [featureUpdateCatalogEntry](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-featureUpdateCatalogEntry?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **catalogName** property to the [qualityUpdateCatalogEntry](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-qualityUpdateCatalogEntry?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **cveSeverityInformation** property to the [qualityUpdateCatalogEntry](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-qualityUpdateCatalogEntry?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **qualityUpdateCadence** property to the [qualityUpdateCatalogEntry](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-qualityUpdateCatalogEntry?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **shortName** property to the [qualityUpdateCatalogEntry](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-qualityUpdateCatalogEntry?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the **productRevisions** relationship to the [qualityUpdateCatalogEntry](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-qualityUpdateCatalogEntry?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **safeguard** property to the [deploymentSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-deploymentSettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the `faultedByContentOutdated` member to the **deploymentStateReasonValue** enumeration.

Added the [enrollAssetsById](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/windowsupdates-updatableAsset-enrollAssetsById?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [updatableAsset](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-updatableAsset?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [enrollAssets](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/windowsupdates-updatableAsset-enrollAssets?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [updatableAsset](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-updatableAsset?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [unenrollAssetsById](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/windowsupdates-updatableAsset-unenrollAssetsById?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [updatableAsset](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-updatableAsset?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [unenrollAssets](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/windowsupdates-updatableAsset-unenrollAssets?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [updatableAsset](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-updatableAsset?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [updateAudience](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/windowsupdates-deploymentAudience-updateAudience?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [deploymentAudience](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-deploymentAudience?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [updateAudienceById](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/windowsupdates-deploymentAudience-updateAudienceById?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [deploymentAudience](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-deploymentAudience?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [addMembers](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/windowsupdates-updatableassetgroup-addMembers?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [updatableAsset](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-updatableasset?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [addMembersById](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/windowsupdates-updatableassetgroup-addMembersById?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [updatableAsset](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-updatableasset?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [removeMembers](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/windowsupdates-updatableassetgroup-removeMembers?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [updatableAsset](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-updatableasset?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [removeMembersById](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/windowsupdates-updatableassetgroup-removeMembersById?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [updatableAsset](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-updatableasset?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [operationalInsightsConnection](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-operationalInsightsConnection?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and supported methods.
Added the [resourceConnection](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-resourceConnection?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and supported methods.
Added the **resourceConnections** relationship to the [updates](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-resourceconnection?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the `driver` member to the **updateCategory** enumeration.
Added the [complianceChange](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-compliancechange?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and supported methods.
Added the [contentApproval](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-contentapproval?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and supported methods.
Added the [updatePolicy](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-updatepolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and supported methods.

Removed the **rolloutSettings** resource type. Going forward, use [scheduleSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-schedulesettings?view=graph-rest-beta) because it better clarifies the role of these settings.

Removed the **softwareUpdateReference** resource type. The [catalogContent](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-catalogcontent?view=graph-rest-beta) and [expediteSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-expeditesettings?view=graph-rest-beta) replace the need for this hierarchy.
Removed the **updates** resource type. Going forward, use [adminWindowsUpdates](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/adminWindowsUpdates?view=graph-rest-beta) instead.
Removed the **windows** resource type. Going forward, use [adminWindows](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/adminWindows?view=graph-rest-beta) instead.

Removed the **windowsDeploymentSettings** resource type. Going forward, use [deploymentSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-deploymentsettings?view=graph-rest-beta) instead.

Added the following CRUD operations for the [deploymentAudience](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-deploymentaudience?view=graph-rest-beta) resource: [List](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/adminwindowsupdates-list-deploymentaudiences?view=graph-rest-beta), [Create](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/adminwindowsupdates-post-deploymentaudiences?view=graph-rest-beta), [Get](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/windowsupdates-deploymentaudience-get?view=graph-rest-beta), and [Delete](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/windowsupdates-deploymentaudience-delete?view=graph-rest-beta).

Removed the `$filter` query parameter from the default request URL for the [List azureADDevice resources](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/adminwindowsupdates-list-updatableassets?view=graph-rest-beta) method.

Removed the `$filter` query parameter from the default request URL for the [List updatableAssetGroup resources](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/adminwindowsupdates-list-updatableassets-updatableassetgroup?view=graph-rest-beta) method.
Added the **applicableContent** property to the [deploymentAudience](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-deploymentaudience?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **effectiveValue** property to the [deploymentState](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-deploymentstate?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **expedite** property to the [deploymentSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-deploymentsettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **schedule** property to the [deploymentSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-deploymentsettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **userExperience** property to the [deploymentSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-deploymentsettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the **rollout** property from the [deploymentSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-deploymentsettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.  Going forward, use the **schedule** property instead.

Removed the **safeguard** property from the [deploymentSettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-deploymentsettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. Going forward this property is available from the [contentApplicabilitySettings](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-contentapplicabilitysettings?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Removed the **value** property from the [deploymentState](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-deploymentstate?view=graph-rest-beta) resource. Going forward, use the **effectiveValue** property instead.
Added the **products** relationship to the [adminWindowsUpdates](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/adminWindowsUpdates?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [product](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/windowsupdates-product?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and supported methods.
